TopicTitle: Possible to limit what is displayed in context menu?

Articles.Content:
Is it possible to limit what is displayed when you right click on an object and get the context menu?

![2agsubd.jpg](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i61.tinypic.com/2agsubd.jpg)

As you can see, the list is like the energizer bunny, it keeps going and going.
I wish there was a way to make it wider, that way you can put more information on a single line.

Or have a sub menu's or even move the window sometimes it gets so long, I can't move or zoom out to get it all in the window so something, I can't get to ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
